original: 太原中都人，西晉官員、文人。曾言：「所以枕流，欲洗其耳；所以漱石，欲礪其齒。」，此即枕流漱石典故出處。
text: Taiyuan Zhongdu, officials and literati of the Western Jin Dynasty. It was once said:  'So the occipital flow, I want to wash my ears; therefore, I gargle stone, I want to sharpen his teeth.' This is the source of the occipital flow gargle.
